name: The Sims 2
description: Installs DVD version of The Sims 2. It's universal for all editions and offline installers.
notes: IMPORTANT: READ THE MANUAL AND INSTALL DEPENDENCIES! See https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/Game:-The-Sims-2 - Please select the executable in the Lutris configuration after installing the game. - To fix various issues with the game (broken family thumbnails, models exploding), start the game once, exit when it enters the town selection menu, then Stop the game in the Lutris client. Next time you launch it, the fixes will already be applied. - As this installer has only been tested with the Ultimate Collection, correct functionality of other editions is not guaranteed. - For support, contact @Tannis Root on Linux Gamers Group server.
content:
files:
- d9vk:
    filename: d9vk-master.b25eaf65e7731d42263b78d091de672cdc791e05.zip
    url: https://git.froggi.es/joshua/d9vk/-/jobs/750/artifacts/download
- fixes: https://github.com/tannisroot/installer-fixes/raw/master/sims2_fixes.tar.xz
- script: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tannisroot/installer-fixes/master/sims2fix.sh
- file: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine Prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: d9vk
- copy:
    dst: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runtime/dxvk/d9vk-b25eaf65/
    src: $CACHE/dxvk-release/
- task:
    app: mfc42 d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9
    description: Installing dependencies...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: 'true'
- task:
    description: Setting version to xp...
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: winxp
- task:
    description: Setting Vertex Shader Model to 2...
    key: MaxShaderModelVS
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000002'
- task:
    description: Setting Pixel Shader Model to 2...
    key: MaxShaderModelPS
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000002'
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: script
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/sims2fix.sh
- extract:
    dst: "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/My Documents/EA Games/The Sims\u2122 2 Ultimate\
      \ Collection/Downloads"
    file: fixes
- write_file:
    content: boolprop useshaders true
    file: "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/My Documents/EA Games/The Sims\u2122 2 Ultimate\
      \ Collection/Config/userstartup.cheat"
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing The Sims 2...
    executable: file
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    WINE_LARGE_ADDRESS_AWARE: 1
  prelaunch_command: $GAMEDIR/sims2fix.sh
wine:
  dxvk_version: d9vk-b25eaf65
  version: lutris-sims2-4.12.1-x86_64
